front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Guide for the Functional Specification of Medium Voltage (1 kV

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This document provides general guidelines on the preparation of a functional specification for a solid-state electronic shunt device used to compensate voltage fluctuation. The guide covers devices rated to Medium Voltage (1kVâ€“35kV). The device contains in general: an inverter, rectifier or DC converter, energy storage device, and coupling transformer. The device typically is connected in parallel with the network using a coupling transformer.
